de.fuberlin.wiwiss.d2r
Class Map

java.lang.Object
  de.fuberlin.wiwiss.d2r.Map
public class Map
extends java.lang.Object

D2R Map Class. A Map class is created for every d2r:ClassMap element in the mapping file. The Map class contains a Vector with all Bridges and an HashMap with all instances.

History:
07-21-2004 : Error handling changed to Log4J.
09-25-2003 : Changed for Jena2.
01-15-2003 : Initial version of this class.

Version:
V0.3
Author:
Chris Bizer chris@bizer.de
